displayName.text: Dr. Omar Maurizio Altieri, DDS | Restorative and Cosmetic Dentist

formattedAddress: 320 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Altieri provided me the most exceptional care.  He was very receptive of my concerns and provided me explanations with detailed information.  Dr. Altieri completed the implant procedure that I started a year earlier from a different office.  He was diligent and made sure that all my previous problems were corrected.  I can not say enough about the quality of work and the remarkable results I received.

originalText.text: Dr. Altieri was by far the kindest most calming dentist I’ve ever had. 10/10 experience and would recommend to anyone! I love my new smile thanks to him.

text.text: Dr. Altieri was by far the kindest most calming dentist I’ve ever had. 10/10 experience and would recommend to anyone! I love my new smile thanks to him.

originalText.text: Very patient, attention to detail.  Did an amazing job on my mother's dental implants!!

text.text: Very patient, attention to detail.  Did an amazing job on my mother's dental implants!!

originalText.text: Excellent experience with Dr Omar. Meticulous job and very good communication. I highly recommend him.

text.text: Excellent experience with Dr Omar. Meticulous job and very good communication. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Altieri's visit was an outstanding experience, I can say that so far has been the best dentist I’ve ever had. State of the art equipment and techniques, with a gorgeous and calming office environment. I felt safe and taken care of as he takes his time during the exam and explains everything in details.
